definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
to resolve a difficult situation and leave worries behind (idiom)
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries

sentences.english: The three side not to worry, thirteen hit Fuping hou.
sentences.chinese: 七国三边未到忧，十三身袭富平侯。

sentences.english: Aha, a "melancholy" and brave warrior, I like this word.
sentences.chinese: 哈，“忧”勇斗士，我喜欢这个字。

sentences.english: He who can suppress a moment's anger may empress.
sentences.chinese: 能忍一时气，可免百日忧。

sentences.english: The status quo of our party′s conviction is as much satiafactory as challenging.
sentences.chinese: 我们党的现实信仰状况有喜也有忧。

sentences.english: At the windy window the widow finds a blind snake winding.
sentences.chinese: 在当风的窗口寡妇发现有条瞎眼蛇在忧嫰。

sentences.english: And this is what makes the difference between what happens in melancholy and mania.
sentences.chinese: 这就是发生在忧抑症跟狂躁症之间的不同所在。

sentences.english: There's a shell on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 正在沙岸上有一个痹忧。

sentences.english: So far, investments by SWFs have produced ambivalence in recipient nations.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，主权财富基金令被投资国既喜又忧。

sentences.english: This is network business " double-faced sex " , let a person jubilate care letting a person.
sentences.chinese: 这就是网络买卖的“双面性”，让人欢喜让人忧。

sentences.english: One joy dispels a hundred cares.
through the sadness of all things i hear the crooning of the eternal mother.
sentences.chinese: 从万物的忧甜中，我听见了“永恒母亲”的呻吟。

definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
half/half and half/both ... and .../just as much ... as .../equally
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
